item.title: Adding stat requirements
item.dc:creator: @xd_own3d_xd xd own3d xd
item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

ok so i would like to add stat requirements for dungeoneering items on my server, “dungeoneering” xp is gained through the hunter skill so i thought this would work, however it doesn’t, its skill 21 if that helps

		case 16909: //Primal 2h
		c.attackLevelReq = 99;

c.hunterLevelReq = 99;

Read full topic
